SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.managers

Class NioFileManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.managers.NioFileManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NioFileManager
@Service public class NioFileManagerImpl extends Object implements NioFileManager
the NioFileManager handles all file input and output of all OscarDocument files by providing several convenience utilities.

One goal is to eliminate the use of "OscarProperties.getInstance().getProperty("DOCUMENT_DIR")" in every single page of OSCAR code.

  • Field Summary
